title: Where Do I Post NSFW Content?
body:
Is there a flair or something?
Or would you prefer i just refrain from posting things that are too graphic and keep the boards clear of that kind of stuff?
If you want to know what i’m referring to, i made a post recently that was taken down involving Ezreal and a scorpion (Shudders).
But yeah, would you prefer i just post those kinds of things to reddit instead?

replies.body:
Yeeeaaaa those just don't need to be on our boards since there could be a younger crowd around.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Ok, i’ll post NSFW content somewhere else from now on. Thx for being reasonable about it, i was banned from the Blizzard forums for a similar mistake.
